\newcommand{\ottt}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{t}  ,\ \ottnt{c}  ,\ \ottnt{v}  ,\ \ottnt{s}  ,\ \ottnt{n}}{::=}{\ottcom{term}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{triv} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{unit}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{ctag} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{type cast}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A}  .  \ottnt{t} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{$\lambda$-abstraction}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function application}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{pair constructor}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{first projection}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{second projection}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{successor function}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{0}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{zero}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{T}}{::=}{\ottcom{terminating types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{unit type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{natural number type}}}

\newcommand{\ottR}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{R}}{::=}{\ottcom{terminating types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{unit type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{natural number type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ ? \to ? }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottctag}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{ctag}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{ctag}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{ctag'} }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{ctag} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottA}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{A}  ,\ \ottnt{B}  ,\ \ottnt{C}  ,\ \ottnt{D}  ,\ \ottnt{E}  ,\ \ottnt{S}  ,\ \ottnt{U}}{::=}{\ottcom{type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Unit} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{unit type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Nat} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{natural number type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{untyped universe}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{cartesian product type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{\ottcom{typing context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{\ottcom{empty context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{cons}}}

\ottrulehead{\ottnt{vd}}{::=}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\vdash}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\not \vdash}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleunboxName}[0]{\ottdrulename{unbox}}

}{
 \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \sim  \ottnt{A} }{%

}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulearrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{arrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulearrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulearrowName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleprodName}[0]{\ottdrulename{prod}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleprod}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \sim   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \times  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleprodName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntypeConsis}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{B} $}{\ottcom{$\ottnt{A}$ is consistent with $\ottnt{B}$}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulebox{}}

\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%

 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A} }{%

 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }   \mathsf{triv}   :   \mathsf{Unit}  }{%

\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXzeroName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_zero}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXzero}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottsym{0}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXzeroName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsuccName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_succ}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsucc}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \mathsf{nat}( \ottnt{A} ) =   \mathsf{Nat}   }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \mathsf{succ} \, \ottnt{t}  :   \mathsf{Nat}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXsuccName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleSXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \mathsf{prod}( \ottnt{B} ) =   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{S\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleSXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{C}   \quad   \mathsf{fun}( \ottnt{C} ) =  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \sim  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleSXXappName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnstype}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{S} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXunit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXzero{}}

\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXsnd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXlam{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSXXapp{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXpairName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_pair}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXpair}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }{%
{\ottdruleCXXpairName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXlamName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_lam}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXlam}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A}  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{B} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t}   :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXlamName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXappName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_app}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXappName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXcastName}[0]{\ottdrulename{C\_cast}}
\newcommand{\ottdruleCXXcast}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{B}  }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{t}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{B}  \ottsym{\}}    \ottsym{)}  :  \ottnt{B} }{%
{\ottdruleCXXcastName}{}%
}}

%% defn redA
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXvaluesName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_values}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXvalues}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{v}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXvaluesName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastIdName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castId}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastId}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{T} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}    \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{T}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastIdName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastUName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castU}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastU}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}    \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{;}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastUName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceedName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_succeed}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceed}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{R} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :     \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{R}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}    \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{R}  \ottsym{\}}    \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{R}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceedName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrowName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castArrow}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}    \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \rightsquigarrow     \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottsym{(}   \ottnt{v_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}    \ottsym{)}   :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{B_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{\}}     \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{B}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrowName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGroundName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castGround}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGround}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{T}     \quad   \ottnt{T}  \neq  \ottnt{R}     \quad   \ottnt{T}  \neq  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}    \rightsquigarrow   \ottnt{v}  :     \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}    \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}    \ottsym{;}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGroundName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpandName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_castExpand}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpand}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{      \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}   \quad   \ottnt{A}  \sim  \ottnt{T}     \quad   \ottnt{T}  \neq  \ottnt{R}     \quad   \ottnt{T}  \neq  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash   \ottnt{v}  :   \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{\}}    \rightsquigarrow   \ottnt{v}  :     \ottsym{\{}  \ottsym{\mbox{?}}  \ottsym{\}}  \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}    \Rightarrow  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{A}  \ottsym{\}}    \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpandName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXbetaName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_beta}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \ottsym{,}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}   \lambda  \ottmv{x}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  .  \ottnt{t}   \ottsym{)} \, \ottnt{v}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{[}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{/}  \ottmv{x}  \ottsym{]}  \ottnt{t}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXbetaName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_app1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXappOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_app2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{v}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightarrow  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   \quad  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{v} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{v} \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwoName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXfstName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_fst}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXfst}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{;}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{fst} \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXfstName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsndName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_snd}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXsnd}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{;}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t}  \rightsquigarrow  \mathsf{snd} \, \ottnt{t'}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXsndName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOneName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_pair1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \quad   \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{;}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOneName}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwoName}[0]{\ottdrulename{rdA\_pair2}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{  \Gamma  \vdash_{\mathsf{C} }  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}   \quad  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
\Gamma  \vdash  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{t'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{;}   \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \times  \ottnt{A_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwoName}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnredA}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \rightsquigarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{A}$}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXvalues{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastId{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastU{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXsucceed{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastArrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastGround{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXcastExpand{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXappOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXappTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXfst{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXsnd{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXpairOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulerdAXXpairTwo{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn castIn

\newcommand{\ottdefncastIn}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \Rightarrow  \ottnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \ottnt{A} $}{\ottcom{Cast insertion from Siek16}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsReduction}{
\ottdefnredA{}\ottdefncastIn{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsTyping
\ottdefnsReduction
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}

\ottall
